abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby units, dealing damage and causing ministuns.
abilities.notes: Searches for enemies within the radius every interval. If found, one enemy is hit with damage and ministun.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Deploys a ring of powered cogs that trap enemies who touch them, dealing damage and draining mana. Enemies outside the ring are pushed away.
abilities.notes: Creates 8 cogs around Clockwerk. Each cog takes a specified number of attacks to destroy.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a flare that explodes over a targeted area, damaging enemies and providing vision.
abilities.notes: Global cast range. Reveals invisible units briefly upon impact.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling hook that latches onto the first unit it hits, pulling Clockwerk to it and stunning the target.
abilities.notes: Pierces spell immunity. Can latch onto allies but deals no damage or stun.

innate_abilities.name: Armor Power
innate_abilities.description: Clockwerk's mechanical augmentations boost his combat effectiveness, providing damage amplification based on his armor.
innate_abilities.notes: Grants percentage-based damage amplification based on Clockwerk's armor value.
